metaList.name: description
metaList.content: We're Okotoks best choice for phone and tablet repair. Whether it's a cracked screen, poor battery life or damaged back glass, come see us today!

section1.title: Okotoks Fastest Phone, Tablet & Computer Repair
section1.subTitle: 1300 Village Lane #11

section2.title: Get Your Device Fixed Fast & Reliably
section2.content: Phonephix is the most comprehensive destination in Okotoks for fast, efficient and professional iPhone, iPad and Android device repair. When your carrier or manufacturer has given up on servicing your device bring your phone into our shop and we can get it resolved. From batteries that don’t last the day or broken screens, and even phones just not turning on at all. We’re the best option for out of warranty repairs. For local residents with a broken cell phone or tablet, use the online booking link on this page to get a quote on one or multiple device repairs. We have walk-in, mail-in and curbside pickup options available.

section3.title: Trade In Your Device and Save on a New One
section3.content: Older devices can be traded in at our Okotoks location for either cash or credit towards either a repair or the cost of a new device. Skip the sketchy Facebook marketplace meetups, and get cash for your old, broken or unwanted devices by bringing it by our conveniently located Okotoks storefront. While carriers may only give you bill credit or accessory credit, we gladly pay out in cash or e-transfer.

section4.title: Buy a New or Used Device with our 12 Month Warranty
section4.content: We’re proud to offer certified pre-owned devices for those looking to upgrade or maybe replace a device that’s beyond economical repair. The phones and tablets we have all pass 60-point functionality tests and aesthetically are in excellent condition. Battery duration is tested and the battery is replaced if needed, and backed up by a one year warranty that excludes all physical or liquid damage. For customers who can see themselves potentially breaking the screen on a phone due to accidents, we’d recommend asking about the accidental insurance coverage.

section5.title: See Why Customers Love Mobile Tech Lab

reviews.content: Phonephix is a business who truly cares about their customers! I went in and the staff there were honest about if it was in my best interest to get one of my older devices fixed. They said as much as they want my business that it wasn't worth it for how old the device was. They offered a bunch of other options to help me out with what I needed. They were honest, helpful, and thoughtful!

The team at Phonephix fixed up my girlfriend's phone screen and have honoured their warranty twice now. I was very happily surprised at their cooperation and professionalism. I would highly recommend this shop if you need repairs. Thanks again!

I honestly believe this is the best customer service I have ever received. They are amazing, fast and affordable! Also, to top it off the warranty all their work. The woman spoke to my daughter about her broken iPad directly. Seems like a small thing to rave about but it was so kind. She was so heartbroken to have broken the screen and this woman was so soft and uplifting. I will never go anywhere else but Phonephix again. Thank you so much for this service. Keep up the great work!
